title: Kumail Nanjiani Jokes About White Men, Erewhon at Spirit Awards 2026
desc: Kumail Nanjiani joked about the 'white guy' 'comeback,' Erewhon at the 2026 Independent Spirit Awards.

title: Man 'armed with traffic cone' causes $100K in damage to cars inside Sydney casino
desc: A man has been charged for allegedly using a traffic cone to cause about $100,000 worth of damage to 35 car...

title: Coca-Cola Israel fined 17.7 million shekels by Competition Authority
desc: The Israel Competition Authority fined The Central Bottling Company, which owns Coca-Cola Israel and Tara Dairy, for instructing retailers to promote its products, intervening in Tara dairy prices and making prohibited payments, though the fine was significantly reduced

title: Kwankwaso returns to Nigeria amid US sanctions threat
desc: NNPP leader Rabiu Kwankwaso returns to Nigeria from India amid a proposed US sanctions bill for alleged religious freedom violations. Get the full story.

title: Less than 30% of children with cancer survive in Pakistan: experts
desc: Delayed diagnosis, limited treatment facilities and financial constraints hamper outcomes

title: From Fofō to the Lab: Can Pacific healing help fight deadly viruses?
desc: Measles, dengue, and Zika still threaten Pasifika. A scientist is testing whether traditional plant remedies could help create new antiviral treatments.

title: Probe begins into Lagos movie set deaths of two crew members
desc: Police have launched an investigation into the tragic deaths of two Nollywood crew members found lifeless on a Lagos movie set in Lekki.

title: Pak govt hikes diesel prices by PKR 7.32 per litre, petrol by PKR 5
desc: Fuel for vehicles in Pakistan will now be costlier as the Pakistani government has increased the prices of petrol and high-speed diesel by PKR 5 and PKR 7.32 per litre, respectively, for the next fortnight, The Express Tribune reported.

title: GTA 5 mod shrinks file size to 2.5GB, as high storage prices force drastic measures
desc: Even with 2013 origins, GTA 5 now demands more than 100GB of install space. A new mod creates a much lighter, more portable version of the title. While players could avoid pricey storage upgrades, they may decide that the visual downgrades forced by the GTA 5 mod aren’t acceptable.

title: ‘Third time lucky’ for Alex de Minaur as he lifts one of biggest titles of his career
desc: Inspired Alex de Minaur has delivered one of the biggest wins of his career, lifting the Rotterdam Open title by beating red-hot Felix Auger-Aliassime
